channel.title: GitHub V Daily Trending
channel.description: Daily Trending of V in GitHub

item.title: vlang/v
item.description: Simple, fast, safe, compiled language for developing maintainable software. Compiles itself in <1s with zero library dependencies. Supports automatic C => V translation. https://vlang.io

item.title: vlang/v-analyzer
item.description: The @vlang language server, for all your editing needs like go-to-definition, code completion, type hints, and more.
